title: [RESOLVED] Connection Issues 5/5/2016
body:
**UPDATE @ 22:10 AEST**

Everything is back up and running again for OCE and we are doing health checks on our service now.  Please let us know here if you are still experiencing any problems.

**UPDATE @ 21:25 AEST**

We've traced the cause of the issue to an internal service which has failed within our platform.  Our engineers are currently working to restore this but currently don't have an ETA on when we will be back up fully.  As soon as we know more I'll post another update.



**ORIGINAL POST**
Hi all,

We're aware of an issue that is causing players to be unable to connect properly to the League servers and are investigating at the moment.

Please stand by and we'll post more information when we have it.

Mindstar

replies.body:
UPDATE

Everything is back up and running again for OCE and we are doing health checks on our service now.  Please let us know here if you are still experiencing any problems.

Cheers
Mindstar
Ranked still down?
We're hoping to enable it again soon - we just want to be confident everything is running smoothly first :)
My league is crashing every minute ingame(Attempting to Connect message) does it have anything to do with this?
Still not working though?

Hey - what is not working for you?  Can you elaborate a bit?

Thanks :)
Mindstar

Ranked still isn't working for me. Instead of a lobby, I get a black screen.
Here's a link to my post http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/PWNb8n3c-ranked-still-broken
Are ranked queues likely to be coming back on tonight? Appreciate the clarity with all the updates tonight - awesome job Riot!
We're turning them back on now.

UPDATE 

We've traced the cause of the issue to an internal service which has failed within our platform.  Our engineers are currently working to restore this but currently don't have an ETA on when we will be back up fully.  As soon as we know more I'll post another update.

Interesting story ;)

But probably not appropriate right now as it might be confusing for some...

> [{quoted}](name=Agent Mindstar,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=ttr1RTwc,comment-id=00100000,timestamp=2016-05-05T11:39:20.264+0000)
>
> Interesting story ;)
> 
> But probably not appropriate right now as it might be confusing for some...

So are people going to be given some sort of loot crate, free skin, freebie, key, crate, skin shard, as a result of this down time, some of us have paid for skins etc etc etc........................... and now we can't even use them

Would actually laugh if your bold request for free stuff was made good on by riot. We don't pay for the game, we pay to use skins and champions within their game. Don't think they have much of an obligation to give out free stuff just for inconveniencing players by having some down time on their free to play game. Thumbs up for the attempt though!
so is no one else able to log on aswell? {{champion:32}}
Same D:

> [{quoted}](name=jewaldpanda,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=ttr1RTwc,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2016-05-05T11:08:40.724+0000)
>
> so is no one else able to log on aswell? {{champion:32}}

yes we are all having the same problem, either wait it out or play a different game for a while.
So why is the mastery emote not working??

Riot Servers got Ddos

Unlucky {{champion:432}}

replies.poster: J o r d a n s
replies.body: my brothers still having that problem

Every game whether its normals, ranked or custom freezes at 7% in the loading screen i wait long time for it and still nothing.. so i disconnect and relog.. still nothing.. frozen at the loading screen but i can hear the game continuing; pings, kills/deaths etcetc
this has only just started to happen
pls fix rito

Annnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnd it's fixed
GG wp, I feel trolled
Tried 4 different solutions, got another few mates who also still can't log in.
I can't log in still

>
> I can't log in still

is it cause u tilt?

Unable to connect on 3 different accounts, keeps giving inability to connect to server.
Tried changing DNS, didn't help
Everything is fine for me except for ranked queues :(

Ok so i'm able to log in now and the chat is now connected. The queue is also working.
Thanks so much for fixing this{{champion:37}}
I can't connect to chat, but I've been able to make a custom bots game and I'm in-game now (by myself)
Able to log in now. Thank you riot for fixing this.
Still cannot connect to chat. Thanks for getting things sorted :)
It's up guys, thank me later, faster than you Mindstar :3

Been able to log in for about an hour, the issue is they are trying to reset things and something is wrong Internally, like someone plug pulled a server or something stupid... Maybe some Ram's in the server burnt out who knows........... they are underpowered and connections to games are ..................Non Existent.



Mindstar Also I hope you are removing game restrictions, as I have just recieved one for trying to join a game which obviously because of the broken que system didn't work
yeah same here.
I've been able to log in but can't connect to chat services and queues. Please fix {{champion:37}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:37}}
One day a week i get off work to play and this happens, rip getting to g3 tonight
God damn riot servers

Ddos :(
{{champion:32}}
Hurry up Riot and fix this, i gotta rank up!!!
The meme about Rito's servers is never gonna die.

The Taric update has caused it.


 This is what happens when you go messing with ancient powers.


RIP the real {{champion:44}}.

so,how long do we need to wait?
